subproject.corporate outcome: Environmental governance improved for effective management of natural resources, and, better access to priority environmental services.
subproject.description: The proposed project is aimed to strengthen the environmental governance in Mongolia by (i) harmonizing and addressing key environmental and fiscal legislations and policies to facilitate sound environmental governance at all level (ii) strengthening Institutional mechanism to implement and monitor environmental policy at local and central level and (iii) by increasing CSO involvement in environmental decision-making and monitoring through public participation and information disclosure at all levels.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Environmental Govenance
